critique: The document expresses strong disapproval and concern regarding DEI policies, framing them as 'dangerous, demeaning, and immoral.' It evokes a sense of injustice towards those who are allegedly disadvantaged by these policies and aims to instill a sense of urgency to correct the situation. The president is attempting to convey anger and disgust towards DEI policies, while also expressing a sense of hope that the order will correct the situation. The document also conveys a sense of surprise that these policies have been allowed to continue for so long.
